'''Nameless Island Mural''' is a Quest Item obtainable from the Event [[World Quest]], "[[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]." The Quest can be started by interacting with any of the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]]'s Murals.

{{Quote|This group of people must have saved another group on this island.|Paimon, after completing [[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]}}
{{clr}}
